 Reporting Issuer and Issuer Forms 
 If you require assistance, please  contact us . 
 For further filing instructions in Ontario please refer to the  OSC's electronic filing portal . 
 OSC Rule 13-502 Fees  prescribes corporate finance participation fees payable by issuers, as well as activity fees. The following forms are required to be filed by reporting issuers. To review OSC Rule 13-502   click here . 
 To see Appendix A to the Rule,  which lists the Participation Fee payable according to market capitalization ,  click here . 
 Form 13-502F1 
 This form must be used by Class 1 and Class 3B Reporting Issuers to determine their total capitalization which is then used to calculate the Participation Fee owing. Please refer to OSC Rule 13-502 for the definition of a Class 1 and Class 3B Reporting Issuer.  
 PDF Version 
 Form 13-502F2 
 This form must be used by Class 2 Reporting Issuers to determine their total capitalization which is then used to calculate the Participation Fee owing. Please refer to OSC Rule 13-502 for the definition of a Class 2 Reporting Issuer.  
 PDF Version 
 Form 13-502F2A 
 This form must be used by Class 2 Reporting Issuers for an adjustment to the Participation Fee that was estimated at the time of payment. Please refer to OSC Rule 13-502 for further information.  
 PDF Version 
 Form 13-502F3A 
 This form must be used by Class 3A Reporting Issuers to determine their total capitalization which is then used to calculate the Participation Fee owing. Please refer to OSC Rule 13-502 for the definition of a Class 3A Reporting Isuer. 
 PDF Version 
 Form 13-502F6 
 This form must be used by Reporting Issuers to provide notice of exemption from the payment of Participation Fee for a subsidiary entity. Please refer to OSC Rule 13-502 for further information.  
 PDF Version 
 Form 41-101 PIF (Personal Information Form) 
 This form, to be submitted in PDF format, may be required under Part 9 of NI 41-101 or Part 4 of NI 44-101 in connection with an issuer's filing of a prospectus. This form may also be required under Part 4 of NP 12-202 in connection with an application to revoke a compliance-related cease trade order. 
 Word Version 
 Form 45-102F1 
 This form is to be used for Notice of Intention to Distribute Securities under Section 2.8 of NI 45-102 Resale of Securities 
 HTML Version 
 Form 45-106F1 
 This form is to be used to report a distribution under the following exemptions:
 NI 45-106-section 2.3 [Accredited investor]; 
  NI 45-106 section 2.5 [Family, friends and business associates]
 NI 45-106 section 2.9 [Offering memorandum]
 NI 45-106 section 2.10 [Minimum amount investment];
 NI 45-106 section 2.12 [Asset acquisition];
 NI 45-106 section 2.13 [Petroleum, natural gas and mining properties];
 NI 45-106 section 2.14 [Securities for debt];
 NI 45-106 section 2.19 [Additional investment in investment funds];
 NI 45-106 section 2.30 [Isolated distribution by issuer]
 NI 45-106 section 5.2 [TSX Venture Exchange offering]
 OSC Rule 45-501 section 2.9 [Existing security holder] 
 MI 45-108 Crowdfunding 
 section 73.5(2) of the Securities Act (Ontario) [Government incentive security] 
 Under OSC Rule 11-501 Electronic Delivery of Documents to the Ontario Securities Commission, Form 45-106F1 is required to be filed electronically through the following link:  
 File a Form 45-106F1
